timeline.title: 2018 • Launch
timeline.description: Started with 120 partner hotels focused on predictable, standardised stays in metro cities.

timeline.title: 2020 • Safety first
timeline.description: Introduced StaySafe hygiene program with daily audits, UV sanitisation, and contactless check-ins.

timeline.title: 2021 • Homes & villas
timeline.description: Expanded to holiday homes and villas with curated experiences for remote work, weddings, and family reunions.

timeline.title: 2023 • Global growth
timeline.description: Entered Southeast Asia and the Middle East with local operator partnerships and on-ground support teams.

culture.title: Customer obsession
culture.copy: Every team member spends a day on support lines each quarter to stay close to our guests and partners.

culture.title: Ownership
culture.copy: We trust people closest to the problem to make decisions. No heavy approvals—just measurable outcomes.

culture.title: Inclusive teams
culture.copy: We champion diversity across gender, geography, and thought. 45% of leadership roles are held by women.

culture.title: Growth mindset
culture.copy: Learning sprints, mentorship programs, and global mobility help you grow your skills and career.
